modName: Skyrim Fully Animated Blazing Fire Main Menu Replacer
summary: This is my very first mod and after realizing that I have been on the site for years, it was time to create something that I hope will bring some enjoyment!
descriptionHtml:
[center][/center][center]Skyrim 5 Year Anniversary Enhanced Main Menu II 
<br />
<br />A Nexus Mods Exclusive
<br />
<br />
<br />"Skyrim will be 5 years old next month and as all the PC gamers out there know, this game is still light years beyond any other game thanks to the genius-level modders at NexusMods Skyrim - This mod is a great enhancement to the game being that it's lore friendly and comes with amazing audiotrack.
<br />
<br />Song: "Frozen Sleep" 
<br />
<br />This completely animated menu replacer is very simple to install but I do recommend making a backup of the original files that this mod will replace.
<br />After backing up your original files, just copy all the files from this archive within the "Data" folder - All files are inside their respective
<br />branch folders so there is no confusion.
<br />
<br />Optional:
<br />I recommend GeeGee's Font Replacer here: http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/40440/?[/center]
author: sweetbrown66

files.name: Skyrim 5 Year Anniversary Enhanced Main Menu II
